pages.title: Thaumcraft 6
pages.text: Thaumaturgy is the capability of a magician to work miracles. A practitioner of thaumaturgy is a thaumaturge, thaumaturgist or miracle worker.$(br)This is what this mod is all about - drawing magic from physical objects in the form of Essentia and reshaping it to perform miracles.$(br2)$(l:https://minecraftguides.net/tc6/)Thaumcraft 6 Guide$(/l)

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: In order to begin Thaumaturgy, you need a Thaumonomicon.$(br)To get one, you must find some crystals underground and mine them.$(br)You will then be given further instructions from the chat.$(br2)The rest is then up to you to figure out, good luck!

pages.title: Addons
pages.text: These are the installed addons for Thaumcraft.
